mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line - Late News", "As I See It", "1974 Traveling Callers Directory", "A Help for Callers", "A History of Square Dancing - Ralph Page", "Smoother Dancing Poster", "Take a Good Look - Spin Chain the Line", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Opal and Joe Cohen", "Callers Textbook - Chapter Thirty", "National Square Dance Convention", "Style Lab - Walk and Dodge", "Ladies on the Square", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Barry Medford", "On the Record: Review", "Square Dance Date Book", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
